instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 Fan spins for 1 second and goes off.
threads.message:
Hi, I have macbook 820-00165 when it came it was dead after putting the power cable and search through thermal camera i found that U1930 were overheating so i have replaced with with another one and the board start turning on but the fan spins for 1 second then switches off.

All the points gives normal values when it turns on for 1 second.

L7320 and L7310: try to display 1.78v and goes off straight away.
L7630: 1.05v
L7430:1.119 v

I have replaced U1950 , q8150 ,u7600,u7400,u7200,u5620, u7820  and SMC but the machine still does the same

Could it be CPU that has issue?

I have tried to power on with SMC bypass but it doesnt power on at all

Generally when you plug the charger in it spins twice for 1 second each time and stays off. If you press power button afterwards  it does the same 2 times for 1 second and goes off

Device is not liquid damaged

threads.title: 820-00165 Fan spins for 1 second and goes off.
threads.message:
Apart of U1930 (which overheats), what was the reason to change the other chips?

Can you catch any pulse at PLT_RESET_L?
